about:
Hi, I'm Ajmal. I work as a Software Engineer at Tata Elxsi, specializing in Python, Go, and Java and frameworks such as Flask, Gin and Spring Boot. 
 
 I also dabble in the DevOps & Cloud side of things using tools like Docker, Kubernetes, AWS and Helm. On the data front, Iâ€™ve got hands-on experience with databases such as MongoDB, SQL and Redis. 
 
 Beyond work, I enjoy writing novels, reading fiction, learning new languages and hitting the gym. I'm passionate about continuous learning, building personal projects, contributing to open-source communities and volunteering for meaningful causes.
